title: Frozen Shield
summaries: The Frozen Shield is a post-Plantera Hardmode shield accessory combining the functionalities of Paladin's Shield and the Frozen Turtle Shell, redirecting some damage done to teammates to the player, increasing defense by 6, and providing the player with a damage-absorbing shield when they are at low health.

statistics.Tooltip:
Grants immunity to knockback
Puts a shell around the owner when below 50% life that reduces damage by 25%
Absorbs 25% of damage done to players on your team when above 25% life
